name: Wheatley
description:
The Sky Orchestrator was a formidable Dwarven Spider located in the Vardnknd Skykiller Gallery within Runoff Caverns. It controlled the malfunctioning Weather Witch, threatening to escalate a storm into a catastrophic natural disaster.

Encountered initially at the entrance to the gallery, the Orchestrator quickly retreated, triggering a gate to seal behind it. Upon its defeat, it yielded the Ward of the Seasons, a unique Dwarven cuirass offering elemental protection to its wearer.
